title: Odd One Out
description: Three items belong together and one doesn't. Can you spot the odd one out?

questions.question: Which item does NOT belong with the others?
questions.explanation: Carrot is a vegetable, while apple, banana, and strawberry are all fruits.

questions.question: Which item does NOT belong with the others?
